attributes.additional_details:
End the A&E crisis
Belfast City Hospital Accident & Emergency unit was closed in November 2011. Since then at least 5 people have died waiting on emergency care. The closure of the A&E units at Belfast City, Whiteabbey and Mid-Ulster Hospitals as well as the reduction of hours in Downe and Lagan Valley Hospitals has caused massive pressure on remaining A&E units.

We the undersigned demand that the Northern Ireland Assembly Executive immediately re-opens Belfast City A&E unit with full resources as a concrete step towards the end the A&E crisis.
